Package weka.classifiers.functions.neural

Class SigmoidUnit

java.lang.Object
weka.classifiers.functions.neural.SigmoidUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, NeuralMethod, RevisionHandler
public class SigmoidUnit extends Object implements NeuralMethod, RevisionHandler
This can be used by the neuralnode to perform all it's computations (as a sigmoid unit).
Version:
$Revision: 8034 $
Author:
Malcolm Ware (mfw4@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
